UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Extremely abundant antimicrobial peptides existed in the skins of nine kinds of Chinese odorous frogs.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Lee WH, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCCB 10104(MIC=>200µg/ml)
